invoice_digitization_guide.title: Commercial Invoice Digitization: Accounts Payable Automation

expert_sections.title: The '3-Way Match' Failure: Why AP Automation Breaks
expert_sections.content:
Accounts Payable teams care about one thing: The 3-Way Match (PO vs. Receipt vs. Invoice). Commercial Invoices from overseas vendors break this logic because:

1. **No PO Reference:** Vendors often omit your Purchase Order number on the PDF. Without it, the invoice sits in a 'Mystery Queue' forever. We fuzzy-match line item descriptions to open POs to auto-assign the number.
2. **Currency Chaos:** The PO was cut in USD ($), but the invoice arrives in EUR (â‚¬). Most AP bots fail here. We pull the daily spot rate from your ERP to validate the variance automatically.
3. **'Miscellaneous' Charges:** Freight, insurance, and packaging fees often appear as extra lines not on the PO. We extract these as 'Non-PO Charges' and code them to specific GL expense accounts automatically.

expert_sections.title: AP Data Extraction Blueprint
expert_sections.content: We normalize unstructured vendor invoices into clean AP vouchers for NetSuite, SAP, and QuickBooks:

mapping_data.normalization_logic: Validate header total matches sum of line items (Line-Level Reconciliation).
Strip vendor prefixes (e.g., 'VEN-123') to match internal Item Master.
Detect changes in bank details to flag potential wire fraud (Business Email Compromise).

expert_sections.title: ROI Analysis: Early Payment Discounts
expert_sections.content:
- **The Opportunity:** Many vendors offer '2/10 Net 30' terms (2% discount if paid in 10 days).
- **The Problem:** Manual data entry takes 15 days, missing the window.
- **The Fix:** DocStandard digitizes invoices in <4 hours, allowing you to capture that 2% discount on millions in spend.
